full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement for Free-Standing Soft-walled Structure Repairs**
====================================================================

**Title** 
--------

English Title: Repairs to Free-Standing Soft-Walled Structures at CFB Borden General
French Title: Réparations des structures à parois souples autoportantes à la BFC Borden général

**Tender Details** 
-----------------

*   **Reference Number:** WS4609971177-Doc4610446512
*   **Amendment Number:** 6
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4609971177
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-05-29
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-12T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2024-07-11
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-07-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-06-30

**About the Tender** 
------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites interested bidders to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for Free-Standing Soft-walled Structure Repairs. This tender involves building and facility maintenance and repair services, including services related to infrastructure maintenance and repair.

**Selection Criteria** 
------------------

The contract will be awarded based on lowest price.

**Trade Agreements** 
-------------------

This tender is open to bidders who have a valid contract or agreement under the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information** 
----------------------

For any questions or concerns, please contact:

Jessica Canas (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [jessica.canas@tpsgc
